transcript:
Patient: Using the Coping Card helped me get through a particularly rough day. I was feeling really down and unmotivated, and my thoughts were spiraling into negativity. I pulled out the card and read through the coping strategies we had written down, like taking a walk outside or doing a quick art sketch. It didn't make everything better, but it did help me get out of my head for a bit.

Therapist: That's a great example of how the Coping Card can be useful in those moments when negative thoughts and
